_comment: DO NOT EDIT: FILE GENERATED AUTOMATICALLY BY PTERODACTYL PANEL - PTERODACTYL.IO
name: VC-MP
author: service@hcgcloud.com
description:
Vice City Multiplayer is a modification for Grand Theft Auto: Vice City that
allows players from around the world to join together and play Vice City in
whatever style they like.

installation.script:
#!/bin/bash
apt -y update
apt -y --no-install-recommends install curl unzip openssl libssl-dev lib32gcc1 ca-certificates libreadline7

# Create a symbolic link for libreadline.so.6
ln -s /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libreadline.so.7 /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libreadline.so.6

cd /tmp
curl -sSL -o server.zip https://raw.githubusercontent.com/hcgcloud/pterodactyl-vcmp/master/server.zip
mkdir -p /mnt/server
unzip -o -d /mnt/server/ server.zip
cd /mnt/server
chmod -R 744 /mnt/server
export HOME=/mnt/server
